text: Bathi: “Siyathobela,” kodwa besakuba bemkile kuwe (Muhammad) iqela elithile kubo lichithe ubusuku bonke liqulunqa ngokuchasene noko ukuthethayo. Kodwa uAllâh Ubhala phantsi (amayelenqe abo obusuku) yithi gu bucala, usuke kubo ubeke ithemba lakho kuAllâh. UAllâh Wanele Eyedwa ukuba Abe nguMlawuli wemicimbi yenu
